intro: High-speed reflexes. Endless challenge. Total rotation.
description:
Strap in and take control of a futuristic hover ship hurtling through an infinite cylindrical track. In Hover Runners, you don’t steer the ship — you rotate the world around it. Dodge deadly obstacles like blocks and laser fences, zip through glowing tunnels, and ride speed boosts as your velocity climbs to insane levels.

Collect shimmering gems along the way to unlock 7 unique ships, each with their own sleek design. Every second you survive, the pace ramps up — testing your reflexes, focus, and nerves of steel. How far can you make it before the track wins?

The gameplay is fast-paced and endlessly replayable, with a unique rotation mechanic that keeps every run intense. With dynamic obstacles, unlockables, and a simple control scheme, Hover Runners is perfect for quick bursts or extended sessions. It’ll keep you coming back for just one more run.
